SEARCH
Package control

Class ApplicationManager

java.lang.Object
control.ApplicationManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IApplicationManager
public class ApplicationManager extends Object implements IApplicationManager
The ApplicationManager class handles all BTO housing applications in the system.

This singleton class implements the IApplicationManager interface and provides:

  • Application creation and management
  • Application status updates (approval, rejection, withdrawal)
  • Flat booking process
  • Receipt generation
  • Application data persistence

ApplicationManager manages the complete lifecycle of BTO applications, from submission through approval to booking or withdrawal.

Version:
1.0

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static ApplicationManager getInstance()
      Gets the singleton instance of ApplicationManager.

      Creates the instance if it doesn't already exist.

      Returns:
      The singleton ApplicationManager instance

    • loadApplications

      private void loadApplications()
      Loads application data from the applications.txt file.

      Creates BTOApplication objects with all their associated data:

      • Applicant information
      • Target project
      • Selected flat type
      • Application status
      • Withdrawal request status
      • Assigned flat type (if any)

    • saveApplications

      public void saveApplications()
      Saves all application data to the applications.txt file.

      Writes each application's data as a pipe-separated line with all relevant details: applicant NRIC, project name, selected flat type, status, withdrawal request status, and assigned flat type.

      Specified by:
      saveApplications in interface IApplicationManager

    • getApplicationsForProject

      public List<BTOApplication> getApplicationsForProject(String projectName)
      Gets a list of all applications for a specific project.
      Specified by:
      getApplicationsForProject in interface IApplicationManager
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project to get applications for
      Returns:
      A list of applications for the specified project

    • createApplication

      public boolean createApplication(Applicant applicant, BTOProject project, FlatType flatType)
      Creates a new BTO application.

      An applicant can only have one active application at a time. If they already have an application that is PENDING, SUCCESSFUL, or BOOKED, they cannot create a new one. If their current application is UNSUCCESSFUL or WITHDRAWN, it will be replaced with the new application.

      Specified by:
      createApplication in interface IApplicationManager
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant creating the application
      project - The BTO project being applied for
      flatType - The flat type being applied for
      Returns:
      true if the application was successfully created, false otherwise

    • updateApplicationStatus

      public boolean updateApplicationStatus(BTOApplication application, ApplicationStatus newStatus)
      Updates the status of a BTO application.

      This method is primarily used by HDB Managers to approve or reject applications.

      Specified by:
      updateApplicationStatus in interface IApplicationManager
      Parameters:
      application - The application to update
      newStatus - The new status for the application
      Returns:
      true if the status was successfully updated

    • requestWithdrawal

      public boolean requestWithdrawal(BTOApplication application)
      Submits a withdrawal request for a BTO application.

      The withdrawal is not immediate; it must be approved by an HDB Manager.

      Specified by:
      requestWithdrawal in interface IApplicationManager
      Parameters:
      application - The application to request withdrawal for
      Returns:
      true if the withdrawal request was successfully submitted

    • approveWithdrawal

      public boolean approveWithdrawal(BTOApplication application)
      Approves a withdrawal request for a BTO application.

      This method is used by HDB Managers to approve withdrawal requests. If the application was already in BOOKED status, the flat unit is returned to the available pool.

      Specified by:
      approveWithdrawal in interface IApplicationManager
      Parameters:
      application - The application to approve withdrawal for
      Returns:
      true if the withdrawal was successfully approved, false otherwise

    • rejectWithdrawal

      public boolean rejectWithdrawal(BTOApplication application)
      Rejects a withdrawal request for a BTO application.

      This method is used by HDB Managers to reject withdrawal requests. The application remains in its current status.

      Specified by:
      rejectWithdrawal in interface IApplicationManager
      Parameters:
      application - The application to reject withdrawal for
      Returns:
      true if the withdrawal request was successfully rejected, false otherwise

    • bookFlatWithType

      public boolean bookFlatWithType(BTOApplication application, FlatType selectedFlatType)
      Books a flat for a successful application.

      This method is used by HDB Officers to finalize the booking process. The selected flat type must be eligible for the applicant and have available units. After booking, the application status changes to BOOKED and the remaining units count is updated.

      Specified by:
      bookFlatWithType in interface IApplicationManager
      Parameters:
      application - The application to book a flat for
      selectedFlatType - The flat type to book
      Returns:
      true if the flat was successfully booked, false otherwise

    • generateReceipt

      public String generateReceipt(BTOApplication application, HDBOfficer officer)
      Generates a receipt for a booked application.

      The receipt includes:

      • Applicant details
      • Project details
      • Flat details
      • Booking details

      If generated by an HDB Officer, the receipt is marked as official.

      Specified by:
      generateReceipt in interface IApplicationManager
      Parameters:
      application - The application to generate a receipt for
      officer - The HDB Officer generating the receipt, or null if generated by the applicant
      Returns:
      The formatted receipt as a string, or an error message if the receipt cannot be generated
